org.weso.wesearch.model.impl

Class FileOntologyLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.weso.wesearch.model.impl.FileOntologyLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OntoLoader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    URLOntologyLoader

    public class FileOntologyLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements OntoLoader
    This class implements the interface OntoLoader and allows to wesearch load ontologies from files
    Author:
    Ignacio Fuertes Bernardo
